sentences: Aya Ōmasa (大政 絢, Ōmasa Aya, born February 4, 1991) is a Japanese model and actress.
Omasa co-starred with Shōta Sometani in Natsuki Seta's 2010 film A Liar and a Broken Girl.
She appeared in the 2011 film Paradise Kiss.
